Period Name Year. Stores the year information in the format YYYY. Eg :- 2006

presentationColumns.name: T01 Per Name Week
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Period Name Week. Stores the week information in the format YYYY Week Number. Eg :- 2006 Week 40
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T01 Per Name Week

presentationColumns.name: T02 Per Name Month
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Period Name Month. Stores the month information in the format YYYY / MM. Eg :- 2006 / 11
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T02 Per Name Month

presentationColumns.name: T03 Per Name Qtr
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Period Name Quarter. Stores the Quarter information in the format YYYY QQuarterNumber. Eg :- 2006 Q3
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T03 Per Name Qtr

presentationColumns.name: T04 Per Name Half
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Period Name Half. Stores the Half year information in the format YYYY HYHalfYearNumber. Eg :- 2006 HY2
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T04 Per Name Half
